contentrichtext.text: {{italic title}} {{Taxobox | name = Xandrames (genus) | image = | image_width = 300px | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Arthropod]]a | classis = [[Insect]]a | ordo = [[Lepidoptera]] | familia = [[Geometridae]] | subfamilia = | genus = '''''Xandrames''''' | genus_authority = Moore, 1868 | subdivision_ranks = [[Species]] | subdivision = }} '''''Xandrames''''' is a genus of moth in the family [[Geometridae]]. ==Species== *''[[Xandrames albofasciata]]'' <small>Moore, 1868</small> *''[[Xandrames dholaria]]'' <small>Moore, 1868</small> *''[[Xandrames latiferaria]]'' <small>(Walker, 1860)</small> *''[[Xandrames opisthochroma]]'' <small>Prout, 1928</small> *''[[Xandrames postmarginata]]'' <small>Wileman & South, 1917</small> *''[[Xandrames xanthomelanaria]]'' <small>Poujade, 1895</small> *''[[Xandrames xanthos]]'' <small>Sato, 1996</small> ==References== *[http://www.nhm.ac.uk/jdsml/research-curation/projects/butmoth/GenusList3.dsml?searchPageURL=index.dsml&SUPERFAMIL=&FAMILYqtype=starts+with&FAMILY=geometridae&SUBFAMILYqtype=starts+with&SUBFAMILY=&TRIBEqtype=starts+with&TRIBE=&SUBTRIBEqtype=starts+with&SUBTRIBE=&GENUSqtype=starts+with&GENUS=&AUTHORqtype=starts+with&AUTHOR=&YEARqtype=equals&YEAR=&sort=GENUS Natural History Museum Lepidoptera genus database] *[http://www.taxapad.com/local.php?taxonidLC=82844980 taxapad] [[Category:Boarmiini]] {{Boarmiini-stub}}
